","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"find_dependencies","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function extracts external package dependencies for the analyzed project by reading and parsing a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"requirements.txt","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file. It translates Python package version specifiers into FASTEN-compatible version constraint ranges, enabling standardized dependency representation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc49921d-9d08-4471-b102-70dbfdd0f9f6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function bridges Python packaging semantics with the FASTEN dependency model, allowing accurate cross-ecosystem dependency analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4e2c682c-897d-49ba-977f-6cde6d7c2267","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"002895fa-4ac6-44b9-8073-c83db37650dd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"find_dependencies","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is to populate the FASTEN dependency set (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"depset","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") with external library information. It ensures that dependency names and version constraints are expressed in a normalized, schema-compliant format.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9131b33d-2111-41c3-a484-201ed3ba4edd","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"3b4d3427-8f31-4b5b-9739-1f92f29afb67","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed ","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_range","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" nested function converts a pair of lower and upper version bounds into a single FASTEN-compatible range expression. It correctly handles inclusive and exclusive boundaries and appends the resulting range to the dependency’s constraint list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"769f69c5-da72-4f39-bc5e-ff3512590793","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"757e2c18-6f56-430d-9655-cf658f88f125","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role of add_range","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f4166844-4645-42a0-b848-1681e4f9fa49","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This helper function encapsulates the logic for translating Python comparison operators (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":">","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":">=","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<=","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") into FASTEN interval notation. By isolating range construction logic, it improves readability and correctness of version constraint
